relevant_findings.general: Eyes closed, screaming out intermittently, restless. No acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Left surgical pupil. Right pupil reactive (RRL). Sclerae anicteric, mucous membranes dry, oropharynx clear. Poor dentition noted.
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, jugular venous pressure not elevated, no lymphadenopathy.
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes or rhonchi, but mild bibasilar rales.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Faint heart sounds, regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, mild tenderness just below umbilicus, no rebound tenderness or guarding, bowel sounds positive.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 1+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis, or edema. Cachectic.
relevant_findings.neurological: Responds to voice, difficulty opening eyes, cranial nerves II-XII intact (except left surgical pupil), moving extremities on command, increased tone, resists movement.
